data.title: Windsor Store at Northlake Mall
data.meta_description: Windsor Store at Northlake Mall in Charlotte, NC offers the latest women's fashion in dresses, tops, denim, shoes & more!
data.text:
About Windsor Store at Northlake Mall

At the Windsor Store in Charlotte, NC, we aim to provide you with a retail experience like no other for shopping for women’s clothing and on-trend fashions at Northlake Mall. Our over 340 retail stores nationwide provide you with a style destination to capture the latest apparel trends, formal attire for any occasion, and your favorite influencer-inspired head-to-toe outfits!

For the spring and summer seasons, our stylists are ready to have you looking chic and in style for both work and play during the warmer months. We’re dedicated to crafting a one-of-a-kind in-store experience that will leave an indelible mark on your shopping visit, helping you find that ideal dress or ensemble. Ensuring you look and feel your absolute best, our collections are constantly evolving with fresh arrivals, guaranteeing you always have access to the most exciting and current pieces to refresh or update your wardrobe for spring and summer.

You can locate your Windsor Store at Northlake Mall on Level 1 near Lids, with the entrance near Macy’s. We invite you to connect with us and share your shopping experiences with others:

Stay updated with Windsor at Northlake Mall on Facebook

Share your favorite styles & in-store photos on Google

Tell others about the Windsor Store in Charlotte, NC on Yelp

Does Windsor have stores for prom dresses near me?

Yes, you can shop for prom dresses near you at Windsor both in-store in Charlotte and online! Our in-store stylists year-round are happy to help you try on formal dresses for prom and all your special occasions. Be sure to visit us to find a stunning and unique dress for Prom 2024 that will make a statement. Shop Windsor’s Prom Dresses online for even more post-worthy styles. We also offer a variety of options to complete your prom outfit with heels, faux fur wraps, clutches, dress alternatives like formal jumpsuits, and more to create your perfect look.

Does Windsor sell more than formal dresses?

Yes, you can find the latest fashions for concerts, graduation outfits, work, clubwear, loungewear, and cocktail attire. From Windsor’s everyday essentials like basic tops and jeans to outfits that you can’t do without, you’ll revel in exploring our handpicked variety of on-trend tops, stylish women’s bottoms, an array of jackets, shoes, jewelry, and accessories. Where else can you find all your must-have fashion essentials in one place, tailored for the spring and summer seasons?

What You’ll Find At A Windsor Store Near You

At Windsor, you’ll find regular inventory updates that seamlessly carry you from spring chic to summer trendy. Explore and try on a curated selection featuring exclusive and unique dresses, jumpsuits in casual to formal styles, jackets perfect for transitional weather, a variety of women’s bottoms and tops, shoes, and more, ensuring you never have to worry about not having something to wear again when going out or celebrating!

Our store boasts a beautiful selection of dresses, ranging from mini or short silhouettes, high-low to asymmetrical, mid-length dress hems, and long to maxi lengths, available in casual to formal styles. From dresses to separates, we got you covered to feel beautiful for all your special occasions, birthdays, high school dances, college events, summer formals, military balls, parties, 2024 graduation dresses, and spring or summer weddings.

Discover workwear options with women’s cargos in skirt or pant styles or stylish pants that can take you from the desk to happy hour. Windsor blazers offer classic longline styles to hyper-cropped options that are worthy of a night out. Level up your spring and summer outfits or everyday attire with stylish options from our diverse range of women’s apparel and fashions.

Can I find formal attire for a last-minute event?

If you need a last-minute outfit to fit your fashion mood, Windsor store has dressy and formal attire year-round. With over 340 women’s clothing stores nationwide, come in and let us help you find what to wear for any last-minute invite or occasion! Explore our diverse range of on-trend apparel, featuring unique jumpsuits, dress rompers, or party dresses in velvet, satin, or glitter to help you stand out. Don’t miss sequin dresses with figure-flattering prints and patterns centered for maximum impact and sultry metallic dresses fit for any bash!

Can I find what I need for a wedding or bridal event, even if I am a guest?

From guests to the bridal party, discover Windsor’s Wedding Shop. Catering to what a bride needs, find attire for all the spring or summer wedding events from bridal shower dresses for the bride and her squad and honeymoon outfit ideas to stunning dresses for bridesmaids, the maid of honor, or elegant options for mothers of the bride or groom. You’ll feel confident when you aim to be the best-dressed wedding guest too!

Can I find vacation outfits for spring break or a summer getaway?

Whether it’s weekend getaways or summer vacations, you’ll travel as an on-trend beauty in the latest vacation outfits featuring sexy dresses, vibrant women’s tops, essential separates, rompers, jumpsuits, and chic layers, making packing effortless and stylish. Explore spring or summer fashion trends here.

For life’s formal occasions, such as high school dances, balls, college formals, pageants, and charity galas, Windsor stocks all the dress and outfit styles you need, including:

Cocktail dresses in short, midi, or long dress lengths, and new trends like cutout dresses. Check out dress alternatives from jumpsuits to matching sets with Windsor’s Cocktail Attire collection.

Achieve a chic appearance with flattering little black dresses and little white dresses with long-sleeve, one-shoulder, cold-shoulder, and off-the-shoulder sleeves.

Gorgeous formal dresses and gowns are regularly updated and curated for the current season including formal floral dresses and luxe fabrics for all the right seasonal vibes.

Semi-formal dresses will hit that happy medium between dressy and formal with options to have you ready for any event.

Bold colors and trendy accents on dress pants, skirts, blouses, stylish jumpsuits, two-piece sets, and an array of women’s clothing updated for 2024!

You’ll also find at a Windsor store near you everything in between, from faux fur wraps and stylish heels to sticky bras and silver- or gold-plated jewelry!

Can I find club dresses near me at a Windsor store?

Whether it’s a club dress, going out outfits, or party-ready styles, yes, you will find fresh fashion all year with regular new arrivals so you can always make a statement. Try on these new updates in store:

From cutouts and sheer accents to ruching and ruffles, Windsor club dresses showcase options with strapless to long-sleeve styles that are ready for any VIP. Discover silky satin dresses in a variety of colors or fitted or tight bodycon dresses to turn heads.

Make dressing up for your b-day effortless by choosing birthday party dresses including red dresses in shades from ruby red to burgundy wine, stunning black dresses for an elevated look during any milestone celebration, or white dresses from casual to formal to fit any fashion mood.

If you’re planning a GNO (Girl’s Night Out) or your next stunning night-out look, be sure to capture going-out dresses with new accents like rhinestones fringe, colorful heatstones, or faux pearl accents.

No look is complete without some shine, so choose from Windsor jewelry sets, necklaces, chokers, earrings, bracelets, rings, and statement pieces to elevate your appearance.

Updated Collections Near You That Embrace Spring & Summer

Always on the pulse of fashion, discover what’s new near you for the spring and summer seasons at Windsor Store in Charlotte. We have you covered for high school dances, spring break, date nights, summer holiday parties like the Fourth of July or Memorial Day, and everyday styling. With a wide variety of trendy apparel, you’re sure to have stylish spring and summer outfits for last-minute plans, stunning photoshoots, or showcasing the latest trends during brunch with friends.

Begin your seasonal wardrobe update with these 7 must-see collections in store:

Dresses in mini or short lengths: Mini dresses from Windsor are elevated with the best trends, sleeves, and necklines to have you ready from spring break to Labor Day. Don’t miss trendy short dresses in a variety of colors to fit any skin tone with stylish details like pearls, rhinestones, or 3D floral accents.

2024 Festival & Concert Outfits: Embrace the concert and festival season with the latest casual dresses, bottoms in faux leather to denim, shorts, graphic tees, sexy sweater tops, platform shoes, hats, body jewelry, and more for post-worthy concert or festival looks.

Chic Midi Dresses: Elevate your look with a variety of chic midi dresses for any styling need. Shop updated necklines and sleeves, trendy spring and summer colors and prints, mid-length hems in flowy or fitted silhouettes, and casual to formal midis enhanced with ruffle, drawstring, or layered designs.

Updated Denim & Everyday Essentials: Refresh your go-to pieces like basics and jeans. Discover the latest denim trends in black, blue, white, ripped, or distressed styles. Explore trendy women’s jeans by Windsor Denim, including cropped, high-waisted, skinny, flare, and wide-leg jeans. Update basic tops and find new go-to pieces from Windsor’s new Smooth Collection with tops for layering, contouring dresses or rompers, and more to breathe new life into your wardrobe.

Matching Sets and Loungewear: With new fabrics, designs, and colors, update your closet effortlessly with matching top and bottom sets, stylish loungewear, lingerie, and essential tanks and tees to refresh your look for the season.

Updated Tops For Women: Capture all that’s trending across social media and in your favorite fashion mags with a wide variety from corset tops and bustiers to bodysuits and short-sleeve tops for an easy closet refresh. Stay ahead of the fashion curve with consistent inventory updates to crop tops, tie-front layers, cute tees, going-out tops, and stylish blouses for an on-trend appearance.

Women’s Jackets: Complete your wardrobe transition with stylish layers from a range of versatile women’s jackets, including jean and faux leather jackets, fashion kimonos, toppers, boleros, and other trendy layering choices to match your fashion mood.

This clothing store near you in Charlotte, NC is your one-stop-shop to elevate your look. We offer everyday casual dresses to statement-making long dresses, pencil skirts to skorts, graphic tees to long-sleeve tops, and must-have fashions for a complete head-to-toe look in 2024.

Windsor is the place where you can reinvent your fashion style with the latest trends and a community of like-minded stylists who know the best looks for every occasion. Our stylists at Windsor Store Northlake Mall are always knowledgeable, helpful, and ready to assist you. Come in and shop with us, and let’s make your spring and summer wardrobe unforgettable!
